org.cojen.boxtin.DenyAction

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DenyAction
    DenyAction.check(MethodHandleInfo predicate)
    Returns this deny action but with a predicate check to determine if the operation should actually be allowed.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.custom(MethodHandleInfo mhi)
    Returns a deny action which performs a custom operation.
    DenyAction
    Rule.denyAction()
    Returns the deny action for this rule, which is null if the rule isn't denied.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.empty()
    Returns a deny action which returns an empty instance.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.exception(Class<?> clazz)
    Returns a deny action which throws an exception without a message.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.exception(Class<?> clazz, String message)
    Returns a deny action which throws an exception with an optional message.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.exception(String className)
    Returns a deny action which throws an exception without a message.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.exception(String className, String message)
    Returns a deny action which throws an exception with an optional message.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.standard()
    Returns the standard deny action, which throws a SecurityException without a message.
    static DenyAction
    DenyAction.value(Object value)
    Returns a deny action which returns a specific value, possibly null.
    Methods in org.cojen.boxtin with parameters of type DenyAction
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Rule
    Rule.deny(DenyAction action)
    Returns a rule which is denied with the given action.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAll(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all constructors and locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ModuleScope
    RulesBuilder.ModuleScope.denyAll(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all packages, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.PackageScope
    RulesBuilder.PackageScope.denyAll(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all classes, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAllConstructors(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all constructors, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyAllMethods(DenyAction action)
    Deny access to all locally declared methods, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyMethod(DenyAction action, String name)
    Deny access to all variants of the given method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyVariant(DenyAction action, Class<?>... paramTypes)
    Deny access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope
    RulesBuilder.ClassScope.denyVariant(DenyAction action, String descriptor)
    Deny access to a specific variant of the current constructor or method, superseding all previous rules.
